name: CincyData
0:
”Alexa, start Cincy Data”
”Alexa, ask Cincy Data to give me a crime report.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cincy data
des:
'Cincy Data' provides a summary of crimes and incidents reported in the city of Cincinnati. The summary is based on crimes and incidents reported on the day "before" (yesterday).

A simple card, provides a breakdown of the type of crime as well as the number of times said crime was committed.

I'm continuing to work on this skill, so check back often for new features.

Coming Up:
- reports based on a specific neighborhood
- reports based on a specific time frame
- map card with locations of incidents
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
